body:
Hi Cw,


I'm not sure how pfsview converts colors to luminance values, but it  
may apply a different set of coefficients from those used in Radiance  
(and pvalue).  This could explain the discrepancy.  The best way to  
check is to compare values for a gray pixel, which should be the same  
regardless of the color -> luminance conversion.


Also, are you 100% sure you are checking the exact same pixel(s)?


-Greg
___
